Uses of Package
org.springframework.boot.jta.narayana

  • Packages that use org.springframework.boot.jta.narayana 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.transaction.jta
    Auto-configuration for JTA.
    org.springframework.boot.jta.narayana
    Support classes for Narayana JTA.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.jta.narayana used by org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.transaction.jta 
    Class and Description
    NarayanaBeanFactoryPostProcessor
    BeanFactoryPostProcessor to automatically setup correct beans ordering.
    NarayanaConfigurationBean
    Bean that configures Narayana transaction manager.
    NarayanaProperties
    Subset of Narayana properties which can be configured via Spring configuration.
    NarayanaRecoveryManagerBean
    Bean to set up Narayana recovery manager.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.jta.narayana used by org.springframework.boot.jta.narayana 
    Class and Description
    NarayanaProperties
    Subset of Narayana properties which can be configured via Spring configuration.
    NarayanaRecoveryManagerBean
    Bean to set up Narayana recovery manager.
